content: nothing says cozy fall quite like pumpkins and this free crochet pumpkin applique pattern is the perfect way to bring that seasonal charm into your projects this beginner-friendly design works up quickly uses just a small amount of yarn and is a fun way to practice basic stitches whether you re decorating for autumn making a handmade gift or adding a special touch to your crochet projects this little pumpkin is sure to brighten up your day
